Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, 
a genocidal alien race which nearly annihilated the human race in a previous invasion. 

Notes:
This is a remux of my previous torrent "Ender's Game 2013 BDRip 1080p FLAC 5.1 multi extras-HighCode", because FLAC is not so compatible as DTS-HD MA.
Those who need Spanish track can download it from the old torrent, it is separate DD-5.1 @640.
Sample is from the same scene as the previous torrent, you can compare their sound.
Those who have 5.1 speakers at home should know that a 7.1 DTS-HD MA will output only the DTS core (@1500)
So instead of DTS-HD MA light will only show the DTS light receiver's display.
Just saying because I doubt that all those hundreds of peers who download 7.1 torrents have 7.1 speakers at home.
